page.title: 17GABLES FARM, SILK WILLOUGHBY
page.content:
Tony & Pat Seymour own 240 acres of {land.}The family came from{West Ashby, {Horncastle,}in l967.
They grow{wheat, barley}and{sugar {beet.}A field is rented to the{Potato {Marketing Board.}They have two {pastures}for{bullocks, ponies}and {donkeys.}They own four{tractors,}a {combine harvester,}a{beet harvester, {ploughs}and{spreaders.
It is not a{highly intensive farm.}The land is owned and not rented. All fields have access to a road. Mr Seymour keeps a diary of what grows and of the{weather}from year to year. In his experience there is little difference in weather from one year to the next and he believes farmers can never have too much rain.
